content.question: Which of the following statements about the series <math alttext="the sum, from n equals 1, to infinity, of the fraction with numerator open parenthesis, negative 1, close parenthesis, to the n power, times n, and denominator n squared plus 1, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup><mi>n</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> is true?

choices.label: The series can be shown to diverge by comparison with <math alttext="the sum, from n equals 1, to infinity, of, the fraction 1 over n" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mo>∑</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>.

The series can be shown to diverge by limit comparison with <math alttext="the sum, from n equals 1, to infinity, of, the fraction 1 over n" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mo>∑</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>.

The series can be shown to converge by comparison with <math alttext="the sum, from n equals 1, to infinity, of, the fraction 1 over n squared, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mo>∑</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>.
The series can be shown to converge by the alternating series test.

content.answer: The series can be shown to converge by the alternating series test.
